author: boudoul
body:
Following the comments made in PR #16168 I have added HcalCalHBHEMuonFilter - I also took the liberty to add TkAlZMuMu- this is something that eventually will be in MC prod, so I worse testing in relval first 
@mmusich @bsunanda @franzoni
title: Adding TkAlZMuMu+HcalCalHBHEMuonFilter to 2017
